title: How do I create a contact? How do I assign a photo to a contact?
answer:
*   Creating a contact


1.  1.  Touch Contacts then ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=76256). Choose where you want to save the contact.![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=76257)
    2.  Enter the contact information and touch SAVE.
    



*   Assigning a photo to a contact


> Note: 

> You cannot assign photos to contacts saved to the SIM card.

> Method: Go to Contacts and touch a contact. On the contact details screen, youch the contact photo area and touch Take photo, Choose from preset or Choose photo from Gallery.

> ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=76258)
